pullRequest.title: Fixed that does not auto detect XML files from URL #2420
pullRequest.bodyText:
Refers: Importing an XML file from a URL does not auto detect the correct importer #2420
I tested with a number of URLs, all of which worked.
The content type response header was: application / xml or text / xml.

commit.message: Fixed that does not auto detect XML files from URL #2420

nodes.bodyText: It would be good to also recognize the +xml suffix as a fallback when we don't have a more specific type, e.g. application/atom+xml but that would require introducing additional generality into the underlying code, so perhaps we can spin that off as a separate issue. We already support a few of the more specific ones such as application/rdf+xml.
